column2:
"...The true purpose of a 《Phantom》?
Don't ask questions when you're not ready to hear the answers. You might live to regret it. Heheheh..."

"Hmph, you again.
...I doubt we'll have anything to say to one another.
I am a shadow. The light has no hold over me."

"Come what may, I stand alone.
...You have your own path to follow."
"Received <yellow>Grinder<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Synthesizer<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Photon Sphere<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Excube<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Lambda Grinder<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Tri-Boost +50％<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Great Success Grind Rate +50%<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Lambda Grinder x3<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Ability Success Rate +30%<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow>Tri-Boost +100％<c> from Kyokuya."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Kyokuya."
"...Ah, yes... I have something for you."
"...Don't go getting the wrong idea, now."
"I'm giving this to you so that you'll go away and stop bothering me. Nothing more."
"...Are we clear? Now, get out of here."

"Hmph, you again.
...I doubt we'll have anything to say to one another.
I am a shadow. The light has no hold over me."

"Come what may, I stand alone.
...You have your own path to follow."
"'Tis the shadow's role ever to lurk in darkness. And now this Demise has presented itself, blithe to what awaits..."
"They'll see. You'll all see. I'll show you the terror that dwells in the shadows. What have you to fear, if not fear itself..."

"Is that joy I see on your face?
Hmph... You'll not find its mirror on mine. A 《Phantom》 has no need for such feelings."
"Make merry while you still have the chance. While you indulge in your own self-righteousness, I will busy myself by confronting our enemy."

"This is the 《Phantom》's way...
To lurk in the shadows, acting with clarity of purpose...
No matter what it takes to achieve our goals."

"...You again.
Someone who wishes to become my disciple, you say?"

"I have only one answer for such a fool...
\"Give up\"."

"The path of the Phantom is a dark road to walk. No-one will light the way for you...
I myself faced certain death, and it was my own power that brought me back from the edge."
"...However... If they are prepared to sacrifice everything to dedicate themselves to the way of the Phantom... Tell them this."
"Don't ask other people how to accomplish your goals. If you can't do it alone, you don't deserve to succeed."
"...Hmph, you seem unsettled. Do you understand now? Until the day you have fulfilled your purpose, you will never truly be able to rest."
"I have let go of any need for encouragement or sentimentality. As a 《Phantom》, I think only of my objective."
"Hmph... What fools they are. Concealing the truth from each other out of fear that it would not be believed."
"The merest word could be all it takes to sway the heart of another. If one does not speak, one will never be understood; to believe otherwise is sheer foolishness. You opened my eyes to that..."
"That aside, they surely never would have reconciled without your help. Be proud of it."
"...There is a stirring in the darkness. The final moment draws near."
"If you fear for your life, then flee. But a shadow fears nothing. We melt into the darkness, waiting for the most opportune moment to strike."

"If you intend to fulfill your purpose, no matter the means...
Then you shall have this shadow's aid."

"フッ、目的を果たしたようだな。
当然だ……この“黒き狼”が
能力を貸した以上は、な。"

"目的の為には手段を選ばない……
そんなことは、お前にとって
百も承知だったようだ。"

"まだ残党どもとの戦いは続くだろうが
その疲れた体では、満足に動けまい。
今は、休息するがいい。"
